participant_1.background:
I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.
last season i was just getting started.
my favorite food is mashed potatoes.
i am the youngest of five.
i write fiction for fun.

participant_2.background:
I'm a working musician who is passionate about my dogs.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
my favorite book is jane austins pride and prejudice.
I am not a morning person, but I do love my parents and sweets.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I am doing great too! Thanks for asking. I am a writer for a living and I love it. What about you?
That's awesome! I am a working musician and I absolutely love it. I'm also passionate about my dogs.
Oh wow! That sounds like a lot of fun! I have always wanted to play an instrument but I just don't have the time.
I definitely recommend it! It's so much fun and it's a great way to relieve stress.
I'll have to look into it! I'm sure I'd be terrible at it, but I'm willing to give it a try!
You never know! You might be a natural at it!
I'm sure you will be! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. I love the characters and the story is so well written.
Oh wow! That's one of my favorites too! I love the wit and humor in the book.
Me too! It's such a classic and I love reading it over and over again.
Me too! It's a great book to read anytime.
I agree! It's always a good time to read Pride and Prejudice.
